title: The twelve hued rainbow above the Sea of Reeds during the miracle of its division into twelve channels of liberation

excerpt: A medieval manuscript illustration of the aggadah that the Yam Suf was split in 12 discrete channels, one for each tribe, as reflected above by a 12-color rainbow . . .
content:
“They [the waters] were divided into many paths equal to the number of the tribes, as the appearance of a rounded bow.” (BL Add 14763; Miscellany of philosophical works including by Maimonides; 13th c; Italy (Viterbo); f.135r)
